title: Red Panax Ginseng with Ginkgo Biloba | Korean Ginseng Extract 800mg + Ginkgo 720mg | Energy, Focus, Memory & Circulation Support | Cognitive Enhancement Supplement - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Ginseng Master - Premium Energy & Cognitive Support

Elevate your mental and physical performance with Ginseng Master with Ginkgo, a powerful combination of Red Panax Ginseng and Ginkgo Biloba. This premium formula delivers 800mg of standardized Korean Ginseng extract (7% ginsenosides) plus 720mg of Ginkgo Biloba to support energy, mental clarity, memory, focus, and healthy circulation.

Key Benefits

  • Enhanced Energy & Stamina: Red Panax Ginseng combats fatigue and supports physical endurance
  • Improved Mental Clarity: Ginkgo Biloba enhances cognitive function and mental sharpness
  • Memory Support: Both herbs work synergistically to support memory and learning
  • Better Focus & Concentration: Promotes sustained attention and mental performance
  • Circulation Support: Ginkgo enhances blood flow to the brain and extremities
  • Stress Resilience: Adaptogenic ginseng helps body cope with physical and mental stress
  • Antioxidant Protection: Both herbs provide powerful antioxidant benefits
  • Immune Support: Ginseng strengthens natural immune defenses

Premium Ingredients

  • Red Panax Ginseng Extract (800mg): Standardized to 7% ginsenosides for maximum potency. Korean Red Ginseng is the gold standard for energy, vitality, and adaptogenic support
  • Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Powder (600mg): Supports cognitive function and circulation
  • Ginkgo Biloba Extract (120mg): Standardized to 24% flavone glycosides for enhanced brain health and blood flow

Why Ginseng + Ginkgo?

This powerful combination has been used in traditional medicine for centuries. Modern research confirms their synergistic benefits:

  • Ginseng provides energy, reduces fatigue, and supports overall vitality
  • Ginkgo enhances blood flow to the brain, improving memory and cognitive function
  • Together they create a comprehensive formula for mental and physical performance

Perfect For

  • Students and professionals seeking mental edge
  • Older adults supporting cognitive health
  • Athletes and active individuals
  • Anyone experiencing fatigue or brain fog
  • Those seeking natural energy without caffeine jitters

Suggested Use: Take 2 capsules daily with meals or as directed by your healthcare provider.

Quality Assurance: Standardized extracts for consistent potency. Vegetarian capsules. No artificial additives.
shortDescriptionHtml: Boost energy, focus, and memory with Ginseng Master. Premium formula combines 800mg Red Panax Ginseng (7% ginsenosides) with 720mg Ginkgo Biloba for cognitive enhancement, circulation support, and sustained vitality. 60 capsules.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Red Panax Ginseng Extract (Standardized to 7% Ginsenosides) (stem) (leaf) 800 mg **
Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Powder 600 mg **
Ginkgo Biloba Leaf 24% Flavones 120 mg **

** Daily Value (DV) not established

Other Ingredients: Vegetable Cellulose, Vegetable Stearate, Silicon Dioxide.
